results.name: a(n) = A295664(n) - A056169(n); 2-adic valuation of tau(n) minus the number of unitary prime divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
formula: Additive with a(p) = 0, a(p^e) = A007814(1+e) if e > 1.
mathematica: Table[IntegerExponent[DivisorSigma[0, n], 2] - DivisorSum[n, 1 &, And[PrimeQ@ #, CoprimeQ[#, n/#]] &], {n, 105}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 28 2017 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 28 2017
